column2: Construct an intelligence agency in order to conduct spy programs abroad. §R Spy programs can only be done by GPs against other GPs.

This spy program will destroy a port in another nation. (There is no way to remove just one level so the whole port is destroyed. Sorry! Technical limitations. The program has a high failure rate to balance this.)
This spy program will steal research points from another nation.
This spy program will increase the militancy and war exhaustion of another nation.
